2000 ton Rider (Military Spaceship)

A mainstay of the Imperial Glisten Navy, these craft have been employed as system defense boats, and auxiliaries on several classes of larger vessels. Maneuver and life support power is approximately 25% of the full power plant capacity, and the endurance shown below is calculated on this basis. Each full power hour of operation consumes four endurance hours.
